DOC.detailed_description: This study single-blind prospective randomize trial 150 patient/caregiver pair ( 50 country ) . Eligibility criteria baseline require primary caregiver spouse patient ; patient must diagnosis AD , mild moderate stage dementia , live caregiver , willing take Donepezil ( Aricept ) . These participant randomly assign one two group : one group , intervention consist drug treatment patient plus psychosocial intervention caregiver ; group intervention consist solely drug treatment patient . The intervention caregiver consist 5 schedule individual family counseling session within 3 month baseline , unlimited consultation request . Assessments conduct every 3 month first year every 6 month second year . There 3 source data : interview caregiver independent rater , assessment patient , count amount medication use .
